bibl.title: Three Duke Petitions.
bibl.note: Three Greek petitions of Ptolemaic date concerning the wrongdoing of unscrupulous individuals and addressed to various officials. - P. Duke Inv. 698. Oxyrhyncha, III B.C. - P. Duke Inv. 676. Arsinoite, 196/5 B.C.? - P. Duke Inv. 360. Herakleopolite?, II B.C.?
bibl.seg: Three Greek petitions of Ptolemaic date concerning the wrongdoing of unscrupulous individuals and addressed to various officials. - P. Duke Inv. 698. Oxyrhyncha, III B.C. - P. Duke Inv. 676. Arsinoite, 196/5 B.C.? - P. Duke Inv. 360. Herakleopolite?, II B.C.?
